name: Walker Products 215-1003 Fuel Injection Idle Air Control Valve
short_description: Idle Air Control Value ( IAC Valve ) Controlled by the onboard computer
The computer moves the pintle in and out of an opening that bypasses the throttle blade
IAC Valve Allows the computer to precisely control idle speed when varying loads are placed on the engine
Symptoms of failure include engine stalling, surging, poor idle conditions, and or a check engine light
Check for proper operation with each tune-up and replace when trouble codes indicate failure
product_description: A stepper motor is controlled by the onboard computer. The computer moves the pintle in and out of an opening that bypasses the throttle blade. This allows the computer to precisely control idle speed when varying loads are placed on the engine. Symptoms of failure include engine stalling, surging, poor idle conditions, and or a check engine light. Check for proper operation with each tune-up. Replace when trouble codes indicate failure. Walker Products began supplying the fuel system needs of the automotive industry in 1946. Today Walker is one of the largest, privately owned manufacturers of fuel system components and engine sensors, and has served the needs of the worldwide automotive aftermarket. We are committed to supplying products manufactured to meet or exceed OEM standards and specifications. This effort is backed by our own manufacturing, product management and engineering staff to ensure it is maintained and accurate in the production of quality parts, vehicle applications, instruction sheets and technical support. Our products include Carburetor and Fuel Injection Repair Kits, Oxygen Sensors and other Engine Management products such as Throttle Position Sensors, Cam and Crankshaft Sensors, Fuel Injectors, Spark Plug Wires and Gaskets. As an ISO 9001: 2008/TS16949 certified company, we are committed to supplying the highest quality products. short_description: Premium Quality: The bearing assembly is made of high-quality materials, ensuring precise matching, durability, reliability and excellent performance. Minimizing noise during use helps to extend the service life of the control valve.

Product List: After purchase, you will be able to get 1 x black idle air control valve. Each product has been tested repeatedly to ensure the highest quality and lasting performance, you can buy with confidence.

Main Function: The function of the idle control valve is to automatically control the air supply under idle conditions according to the engine operating temperature and load, and keep the engine running at a stable idle speed.

Compatibility: This idle control valve is suitable for King Kong idle motors, and its replacement part number is 90380, 10526, 90325864. Please confirm the model of this product before purchasing to avoid unnecessary trouble.

Note: To replace the new idle motor, you need to disconnect the cable for a few minutes to let the car board send instructions. The power supply is still the original signal, and the idle speed will be unstable. Generally, 700-1000RPM is normal.

Makes the car idle smoothly, reduces fuel consumption, improving combustion efficiency and increases performance.

[Reliable Quality] The idle motor is a precision electromechanical device, made of good-quality materials and structural design, with good stability, durability, rust resistance, corrosion resistance, heat resistance, and long service life. It is a good replacement for damaged valves; it meets former factory standards and can provide lasting performance and long service life under various driving conditions.

[Easy to install and use] The IAC idle air control valve is easy to install and can directly replace old or damaged parts without complex tools or professional skills. It saves time and effort. However, in order to avoid installation errors, it is recommended to find a professional to assist in the installation.
